db:abstract.db:para: This is a demonstration on how to use a polar chart in your QML application.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += charts qml quick
SOURCES += \ main.cpp
RESOURCES += \ resources.qrc
DISTFILES += \ qml/qmlpolarchart/*
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/charts/qmlpolarchart INSTALLS += target
